a.n: Concerts in Quarantine: Severin von Eckardstein

p.k: Between March and May 2020, Schinkel Pavillon Berlin opened its unexpectedly vacated exhibition space for a concert series in isolation, titled Concerts in Quarantine. As part of this series, Severin von Eckardstein performs Debussy's Prélude a l'apres-midi d'un faune (arr. Gryaznov), Chopin's Nocturne Op. 27, No. 1, Medtner's Elegy Op. 59, No. 2, Prokofiev's Piano Sonata No. 8, Op. 84 and Medtner's Fairy Tale, Op. 26, No. 3.
p.d: Between March and May 2020, Schinkel Pavillon Berlin opened its unexpectedly vacated exhibition space for a concert series in isolation titled Concerts in Quarantine. As part of the series, pianist Severin von Eckardstein performs Claude Debussy's Prélude a l'apres-midi d'un faune (arr. Gryaznov), Frédéric Chopin's Nocturne Op. 27, No. 1, Nikolai Medtner's Elegy Op. 59, No. 2, Sergei Prokofiev's Piano Sonata No. 8, Op. 84, and Medtner's Fairy Tale, Op. 26, No. 3.
